00048 static inline int
00049 hwloc_get_type_or_below_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type) ;
00050 static inline int
00051 hwloc_get_type_or_below_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type)
00052 {
00053   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00054 
00055   if (depth != HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN)
00056     return depth;
00057 
00058   /* find the highest existing level with type order >= */
00059   for(depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, HWLOC_OBJ_PU); ; depth--)
00060     if (hwloc_compare_types(hwloc_get_depth_type(topology, depth), type) < 0)
00061       return depth+1;
00062 
00063   /* Shouldn't ever happen, as there is always a SYSTEM level with lower order and known depth.  */
00064   /* abort(); */
00065 }
00066 
00076 static inline int
00077 hwloc_get_type_or_above_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type) ;
00078 static inline int
00079 hwloc_get_type_or_above_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type)
00080 {
00081   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00082 
00083   if (depth != HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN)
00084     return depth;
00085 
00086   /* find the lowest existing level with type order <= */
00087   for(depth = 0; ; depth++)
00088     if (hwloc_compare_types(hwloc_get_depth_type(topology, depth), type) > 0)
00089       return depth-1;
00090 
00091   /* Shouldn't ever happen, as there is always a PU level with higher order and known depth.  */
00092   /* abort(); */
00093 }

00114 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00115 hwloc_get_root_obj (hwloc_topology_t topology) ;
00116 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00117 hwloc_get_root_obj (hwloc_topology_t topology)
00118 {
00119   return hwloc_get_obj_by_depth (topology, 0, 0);
00120 }
00121 
00123 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00124 hwloc_get_ancestor_obj_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology , unsigned depth, hwloc_obj_t obj) ;
00125 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00126 hwloc_get_ancestor_obj_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology , unsigned depth, hwloc_obj_t obj)
00127 {
00128   hwloc_obj_t ancestor = obj;
00129   if (obj->depth < depth)
00130     return NULL;
00131   while (ancestor && ancestor->depth > depth)
00132     ancestor = ancestor->parent;
00133   return ancestor;
00134 }
00135 
00137 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00138 hwloc_get_ancestor_obj_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_type_t type, hwloc_obj_t obj) ;
00139 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00140 hwloc_get_ancestor_obj_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_type_t type, hwloc_obj_t obj)
00141 {
00142   hwloc_obj_t ancestor = obj->parent;
00143   while (ancestor && ancestor->type != type)
00144     ancestor = ancestor->parent;
00145   return ancestor;
00146 }
00147 
00152 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00153 hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, unsigned depth, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00154 {
00155   if (!prev)
00156     return hwloc_get_obj_by_depth (topology, depth, 0);
00157   if (prev->depth != depth)
00158     return NULL;
00159   return prev->next_cousin;
00160 }
00161 
00168 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00169 hwloc_get_next_obj_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type,
00170                    hwloc_obj_t prev)
00171 {
00172   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00173   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN || depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
00174     return NULL;
00175   return hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth (topology, depth, prev);
00176 }

00186 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00187 hwloc_get_pu_obj_by_os_index(hwloc_topology_t topology, unsigned os_index) ;
00188 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00189 hwloc_get_pu_obj_by_os_index(hwloc_topology_t topology, unsigned os_index)
00190 {
00191   hwloc_obj_t obj = NULL;
00192   while ((obj = hwloc_get_next_obj_by_type(topology, HWLOC_OBJ_PU, obj)) != NULL)
00193     if (obj->os_index == os_index)
00194       return obj;
00195   return NULL;
00196 }

00202 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00203 hwloc_get_next_child (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_t parent, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00204 {
00205   if (!prev)
00206     return parent->first_child;
00207   if (prev->parent != parent)
00208     return NULL;
00209   return prev->next_sibling;
00210 }
00211 
00213 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00214 hwloc_get_common_ancestor_obj (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_t obj1, hwloc_obj_t obj2) ;
00215 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00216 hwloc_get_common_ancestor_obj (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_t obj1, hwloc_obj_t obj2)
00217 {
00218   /* the loop isn't so easy since intermediate ancestors may have
00219    * different depth, causing us to alternate between using obj1->parent
00220    * and obj2->parent. Also, even if at some point we find ancestors of
00221    * of the same depth, their ancestors may have different depth again.
00222    */
00223   while (obj1 != obj2) {
00224     while (obj1->depth > obj2->depth)
00225       obj1 = obj1->parent;
00226     while (obj2->depth > obj1->depth)
00227       obj2 = obj2->parent;
00228     if (obj1 != obj2 && obj1->depth == obj2->depth) {
00229       obj1 = obj1->parent;
00230       obj2 = obj2->parent;
00231     }
00232   }
00233   return obj1;
00234 }

00240 static inline int
00241 hwloc_obj_is_in_subtree (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_t obj, hwloc_obj_t subtree_root) ;
00242 static inline int
00243 hwloc_obj_is_in_subtree (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_t obj, hwloc_obj_t subtree_root)
00244 {
00245   return hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(obj->cpuset, subtree_root->cpuset);
00246 }
00247 
00267 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00268 hwloc_get_first_largest_obj_inside_cpuset(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set)
00269 {
00270   hwloc_obj_t obj = hwloc_get_root_obj(topology);
00271   if (!obj->cpuset || !hwloc_bitmap_intersects(obj->cpuset, set))
00272     return NULL;
00273   while (!hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(obj->cpuset, set)) {
00274     /* while the object intersects without being included, look at its children */
00275     hwloc_obj_t child = NULL;
00276     while ((child = hwloc_get_next_child(topology, obj, child)) != NULL) {
00277       if (child->cpuset && hwloc_bitmap_intersects(child->cpuset, set))
00278         break;
00279     }
00280     if (!child)
00281       /* no child intersects, return their father */
00282       return obj;
00283     /* found one intersecting child, look at its children */
00284     obj = child;
00285   }
00286   /* obj is included, return it */
00287   return obj;
00288 }

00297  int hwloc_get_largest_objs_inside_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00298                                                  hwloc_obj_t * restrict objs, int max);

00309 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00310 hwloc_get_next_obj_inside_cpuset_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00311                                            unsigned depth, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00312 {
00313   hwloc_obj_t next = hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth(topology, depth, prev);
00314   if (!next || !next->cpuset)
00315     return NULL;
00316   while (next && !hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(next->cpuset, set))
00317     next = next->next_cousin;
00318   return next;
00319 }

00330 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00331 hwloc_get_next_obj_inside_cpuset_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00332                                           hwloc_obj_type_t type, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00333 {
00334   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00335   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN || depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
00336     return NULL;
00337   return hwloc_get_next_obj_inside_cpuset_by_depth(topology, set, depth, prev);
00338 }
00339 
00345 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00346 hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00347                                       unsigned depth, unsigned idx) ;
00348 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00349 hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00350                                       unsigned depth, unsigned idx)
00351 {
00352   hwloc_obj_t obj = hwloc_get_obj_by_depth (topology, depth, 0);
00353   unsigned count = 0;
00354   if (!obj || !obj->cpuset)
00355     return NULL;
00356   while (obj) {
00357     if (hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(obj->cpuset, set)) {
00358       if (count == idx)
00359         return obj;
00360       count++;
00361     }
00362     obj = obj->next_cousin;
00363   }
00364   return NULL;
00365 }
00366 
00376 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00377 hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00378                                      hwloc_obj_type_t type, unsigned idx) ;
00379 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00380 hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00381                                      hwloc_obj_type_t type, unsigned idx)
00382 {
00383   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00384   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN || depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
00385     return NULL;
00386   return hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_depth(topology, set, depth, idx);
00387 }

00394 static inline unsigned
00395 hwloc_get_nbobjs_inside_cpuset_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00396                                          unsigned depth) ;
00397 static inline unsigned
00398 hwloc_get_nbobjs_inside_cpuset_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00399                                          unsigned depth)
00400 {
00401   hwloc_obj_t obj = hwloc_get_obj_by_depth (topology, depth, 0);
00402   unsigned count = 0;
00403   if (!obj || !obj->cpuset)
00404     return 0;
00405   while (obj) {
00406     if (hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(obj->cpuset, set))
00407       count++;
00408     obj = obj->next_cousin;
00409   }
00410   return count;
00411 }

00422 static inline int
00423 hwloc_get_nbobjs_inside_cpuset_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00424                                         hwloc_obj_type_t type) ;
00425 static inline int
00426 hwloc_get_nbobjs_inside_cpuset_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00427                                         hwloc_obj_type_t type)
00428 {
00429   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00430   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN)
00431     return 0;
00432   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
00433     return -1; /* FIXME: agregate nbobjs from different levels? */
00434   return hwloc_get_nbobjs_inside_cpuset_by_depth(topology, set, depth);
00435 }
00436 
00445 static inline int
00446 hwloc_get_obj_index_inside_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00447                                    hwloc_obj_t obj) ;
00448 static inline int
00449 hwloc_get_obj_index_inside_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00450                                    hwloc_obj_t obj)
00451 {
00452   int idx = 0;
00453   if (!hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(obj->cpuset, set))
00454     return -1;
00455   /* count how many objects are inside the cpuset on the way from us to the beginning of the level */
00456   while ((obj = obj->prev_cousin) != NULL)
00457     if (hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(obj->cpuset, set))
00458       idx++;
00459   return idx;
00460 }
00461 
00476 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00477 hwloc_get_child_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00478                                 hwloc_obj_t parent) ;
00479 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00480 hwloc_get_child_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00481                                 hwloc_obj_t parent)
00482 {
00483   hwloc_obj_t child;
00484   if (!parent->cpuset || hwloc_bitmap_iszero(set))
00485     return NULL;
00486   child = parent->first_child;
00487   while (child) {
00488     if (child->cpuset && hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(set, child->cpuset))
00489       return child;
00490     child = child->next_sibling;
00491   }
00492   return NULL;
00493 }
00494 
00502 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00503 hwloc_get_obj_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set) ;
00504 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00505 hwloc_get_obj_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set)
00506 {
00507   struct hwloc_obj *current = hwloc_get_root_obj(topology);
00508   if (hwloc_bitmap_iszero(set) || !current->cpuset || !hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(set, current->cpuset))
00509     return NULL;
00510   while (1) {
00511     hwloc_obj_t child = hwloc_get_child_covering_cpuset(topology, set, current);
00512     if (!child)
00513       return current;
00514     current = child;
00515   }
00516 }

00537 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00538 hwloc_get_next_obj_covering_cpuset_by_depth(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00539                                             unsigned depth, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00540 {
00541   hwloc_obj_t next = hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth(topology, depth, prev);
00542   if (!next || !next->cpuset)
00543     return NULL;
00544   while (next && !hwloc_bitmap_intersects(set, next->cpuset))
00545     next = next->next_cousin;
00546   return next;
00547 }

00564 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00565 hwloc_get_next_obj_covering_cpuset_by_type(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00566                                            hwloc_obj_type_t type, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00567 {
00568   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00569   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN || depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
00570     return NULL;
00571   return hwloc_get_next_obj_covering_cpuset_by_depth(topology, set, depth, prev);
00572 }
00573 
00601 static inline int
00602 hwloc_get_cache_type_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology,
00603                             unsigned cachelevel, hwloc_obj_cache_type_t cachetype)
00604 {
00605   int depth;
00606   int found = HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN;
00607   for (depth=0; ; depth++) {
00608     hwloc_obj_t obj = hwloc_get_obj_by_depth(topology, depth, 0);
00609     if (!obj)
00610       break;
00611     if (obj->type != HWLOC_OBJ_CACHE || obj->attr->cache.depth != cachelevel)
00612       /* doesn't match, try next depth */
00613       continue;
00614     if (cachetype == (hwloc_obj_cache_type_t) -1) {
00615       if (found != HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN) {
00616         /* second match, return MULTIPLE */
00617         return HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE;
00618       }
00619       /* first match, mark it as found */
00620       found = depth;
00621       continue;
00622     }
00623     if (obj->attr->cache.type == cachetype || obj->attr->cache.type == HWLOC_OBJ_CACHE_UNIFIED)
00624       /* exact match (either unified is alone, or we match instruction or data), return immediately */
00625       return depth;
00626   }
00627   /* went to the bottom, return what we found */
00628   return found;
00629 }
00630 
00638 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00639 hwloc_get_cache_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set) ;
00640 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00641 hwloc_get_cache_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set)
00642 {
00643   hwloc_obj_t current = hwloc_get_obj_covering_cpuset(topology, set);
00644   while (current) {
00645     if (current->type == HWLOC_OBJ_CACHE)
00646       return current;
00647     current = current->parent;
00648   }
00649   return NULL;
00650 }
00651 
00656 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00657 hwloc_get_shared_cache_covering_obj (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_t obj) ;
00658 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00659 hwloc_get_shared_cache_covering_obj (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_t obj)
00660 {
00661   hwloc_obj_t current = obj->parent;
00662   if (!obj->cpuset)
00663     return NULL;
00664   while (current && current->cpuset) {
00665     if (!hwloc_bitmap_isequal(current->cpuset, obj->cpuset)
00666         && current->type == HWLOC_OBJ_CACHE)
00667       return current;
00668     current = current->parent;
00669   }
00670   return NULL;
00671 }

00712 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00713 hwloc_get_obj_below_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology,
00714                              hwloc_obj_type_t type1, unsigned idx1,
00715                              hwloc_obj_type_t type2, unsigned idx2) ;
00716 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00717 hwloc_get_obj_below_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology,
00718                              hwloc_obj_type_t type1, unsigned idx1,
00719                              hwloc_obj_type_t type2, unsigned idx2)
00720 {
00721   hwloc_obj_t obj;
00722   obj = hwloc_get_obj_by_type (topology, type1, idx1);
00723   if (!obj || !obj->cpuset)
00724     return NULL;
00725   return hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_type(topology, obj->cpuset, type2, idx2);
00726 }

00746 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00747 hwloc_get_obj_below_array_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, int nr, hwloc_obj_type_t *typev, unsigned *idxv) ;
00748 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00749 hwloc_get_obj_below_array_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, int nr, hwloc_obj_type_t *typev, unsigned *idxv)
00750 {
00751   hwloc_obj_t obj = hwloc_get_root_obj(topology);
00752   int i;
00753   for(i=0; i<nr; i++) {
00754     if (!obj || !obj->cpuset)
00755       return NULL;
00756     obj = hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_type(topology, obj->cpuset, typev[i], idxv[i]);
00757   }
00758   return obj;
00759 }
00760 
00784 static inline void
00785 hwloc_distributev(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t *root, unsigned n_roots, hwloc_cpuset_t *cpuset, unsigned n, unsigned until);
00786 static inline void
00787 hwloc_distribute(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t root, hwloc_cpuset_t *cpuset, unsigned n, unsigned until)
00788 {
00789   unsigned i;
00790   if (!root->arity || n == 1 || root->depth >= until) {
00791     /* Got to the bottom, we can't split any more, put everything there.  */
00792     for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00793       cpuset[i] = hwloc_bitmap_dup(root->cpuset);
00794     return;
00795   }
00796   hwloc_distributev(topology, root->children, root->arity, cpuset, n, until);
00797 }
00798 
00806 static inline void
00807 hwloc_distributev(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t *roots, unsigned n_roots, hwloc_cpuset_t *cpuset, unsigned n, unsigned until)
00808 {
00809   unsigned i;
00810   unsigned tot_weight;
00811   hwloc_cpuset_t *cpusetp = cpuset;
00812 
00813   tot_weight = 0;
00814   for (i = 0; i < n_roots; i++)
00815     if (roots[i]->cpuset)
00816       tot_weight += hwloc_bitmap_weight(roots[i]->cpuset);
00817 
00818   for (i = 0; i < n_roots && tot_weight; i++) {
00819     /* Give to roots[i] a portion proportional to its weight */
00820     unsigned weight = roots[i]->cpuset ? hwloc_bitmap_weight(roots[i]->cpuset) : 0;
00821     unsigned chunk = (n * weight + tot_weight-1) / tot_weight;
00822     hwloc_distribute(topology, roots[i], cpusetp, chunk, until);
00823     cpusetp += chunk;
00824     tot_weight -= weight;
00825     n -= chunk;
00826   }
00827 }
00828 
00835 static inline void *
00836 hwloc_alloc_membind_policy_nodeset(hwloc_topology_t topology, size_t len, hwloc_const_nodeset_t nodeset, hwloc_membind_policy_t policy, int flags)
00837 {
00838   void *p = hwloc_alloc_membind_nodeset(topology, len, nodeset, policy, flags);
00839   if (p)
00840     return p;
00841   hwloc_set_membind_nodeset(topology, nodeset, policy, flags);
00842   p = hwloc_alloc(topology, len);
00843   if (p && policy != HWLOC_MEMBIND_FIRSTTOUCH)
00844     /* Enforce the binding by touching the data */
00845     memset(p, 0, len);
00846   return p;
00847 }
00848 
00853 static inline void *
00854 hwloc_alloc_membind_policy(hwloc_topology_t topology, size_t len, hwloc_const_cpuset_t cpuset, hwloc_membind_policy_t policy, int flags)
00855 {
00856   void *p = hwloc_alloc_membind(topology, len, cpuset, policy, flags);
00857   if (p)
00858     return p;
00859   hwloc_set_membind(topology, cpuset, policy, flags);
00860   p = hwloc_alloc(topology, len);
00861   if (p && policy != HWLOC_MEMBIND_FIRSTTOUCH)
00862     /* Enforce the binding by touching the data */
00863     memset(p, 0, len);
00864   return p;
00865 }

01001 
01032 static inline void
01033 hwloc_cpuset_to_nodeset(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t cpuset, hwloc_nodeset_t nodeset)
01034 {
01035         int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, HWLOC_OBJ_NODE);
01036         hwloc_obj_t obj;
01037 
01038         if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN) {
01039                  if (hwloc_bitmap_iszero(cpuset))
01040                         hwloc_bitmap_zero(nodeset);
01041                 else
01042                         /* Assume the whole system */
01043                         hwloc_bitmap_fill(nodeset);
01044                 return;
01045         }
01046 
01047         hwloc_bitmap_zero(nodeset);
01048         obj = NULL;
01049         while ((obj = hwloc_get_next_obj_covering_cpuset_by_depth(topology, cpuset, depth, obj)) != NULL)
01050                 hwloc_bitmap_set(nodeset, obj->os_index);
01051 }
01052 
01060 static inline void
01061 hwloc_cpuset_to_nodeset_strict(struct hwloc_topology *topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t cpuset, hwloc_nodeset_t nodeset)
01062 {
01063         int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, HWLOC_OBJ_NODE);
01064         hwloc_obj_t obj;
01065         if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN )
01066                 return;
01067         hwloc_bitmap_zero(nodeset);
01068         obj = NULL;
01069         while ((obj = hwloc_get_next_obj_covering_cpuset_by_depth(topology, cpuset, depth, obj)) != NULL)
01070                 hwloc_bitmap_set(nodeset, obj->os_index);
01071 }
01072 
01081 static inline void
01082 hwloc_cpuset_from_nodeset(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_cpuset_t cpuset, hwloc_const_nodeset_t nodeset)
01083 {
01084         int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, HWLOC_OBJ_NODE);
01085         hwloc_obj_t obj;
01086 
01087         if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN ) {
01088                 if (hwloc_bitmap_iszero(nodeset))
01089                         hwloc_bitmap_zero(cpuset);
01090                 else
01091                         /* Assume the whole system */
01092                         hwloc_bitmap_fill(cpuset);
01093                 return;
01094         }
01095 
01096         hwloc_bitmap_zero(cpuset);
01097         obj = NULL;
01098         while ((obj = hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth(topology, depth, obj)) != NULL) {
01099                 if (hwloc_bitmap_isset(nodeset, obj->os_index))
01100                         /* no need to check obj->cpuset because objects in levels always have a cpuset */
01101                         hwloc_bitmap_or(cpuset, cpuset, obj->cpuset);
01102         }
01103 }
01104 
01112 static inline void
01113 hwloc_cpuset_from_nodeset_strict(struct hwloc_topology *topology, hwloc_cpuset_t cpuset, hwloc_const_nodeset_t nodeset)
01114 {
01115         int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, HWLOC_OBJ_NODE);
01116         hwloc_obj_t obj;
01117         if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN )
01118                 return;
01119         hwloc_bitmap_zero(cpuset);
01120         obj = NULL;
01121         while ((obj = hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth(topology, depth, obj)) != NULL)
01122                 if (hwloc_bitmap_isset(nodeset, obj->os_index))
01123                         /* no need to check obj->cpuset because objects in levels always have a cpuset */
01124                         hwloc_bitmap_or(cpuset, cpuset, obj->cpuset);
01125 }
01126 
01154 static inline const struct hwloc_distances_s *
01155 hwloc_get_whole_distance_matrix_by_depth(hwloc_topology_t topology, unsigned depth)
01156 {
01157   hwloc_obj_t root = hwloc_get_root_obj(topology);
01158   unsigned i;
01159   for(i=0; i<root->distances_count; i++)
01160     if (root->distances[i]->relative_depth == depth)
01161       return root->distances[i];
01162   return NULL;
01163 }
01164 
01184 static inline const struct hwloc_distances_s *
01185 hwloc_get_whole_distance_matrix_by_type(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type)
01186 {
01187   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
01188   if (depth < 0)
01189     return NULL;
01190   return hwloc_get_whole_distance_matrix_by_depth(topology, depth);
01191 }
01192 
01206 static inline const struct hwloc_distances_s *
01207 hwloc_get_distance_matrix_covering_obj_by_depth(hwloc_topology_t topology,
01208                                                 hwloc_obj_t obj, unsigned depth,
01209                                                 unsigned *firstp)
01210 {
01211   while (obj && obj->cpuset) {
01212     unsigned i;
01213     for(i=0; i<obj->distances_count; i++)
01214       if (obj->distances[i]->relative_depth == depth - obj->depth) {
01215         if (!obj->distances[i]->nbobjs)
01216           continue;
01217         *firstp = hwloc_get_next_obj_inside_cpuset_by_depth(topology, obj->cpuset, depth, NULL)->logical_index;
01218         return obj->distances[i];
01219       }
01220     obj = obj->parent;
01221   }
01222   return NULL;
01223 }
01224 
01236 static inline int
01237 hwloc_get_latency(hwloc_topology_t topology,
01238                    hwloc_obj_t obj1, hwloc_obj_t obj2,
01239                    float *latency, float *reverse_latency)
01240 {
01241   hwloc_obj_t ancestor;
01242   const struct hwloc_distances_s * distances;
01243   unsigned first_logical ;
01244 
01245   if (obj1->depth != obj2->depth) {
01246     errno = EINVAL;
01247     return -1;
01248   }
01249 
01250   ancestor = hwloc_get_common_ancestor_obj(topology, obj1, obj2);
01251   distances = hwloc_get_distance_matrix_covering_obj_by_depth(topology, ancestor, obj1->depth, &first_logical);
01252   if (distances && distances->latency) {
01253     const float * latency_matrix = distances->latency;
01254     unsigned nbobjs = distances->nbobjs;
01255     unsigned l1 = obj1->logical_index - first_logical;
01256     unsigned l2 = obj2->logical_index - first_logical;
01257     *latency = latency_matrix[l1*nbobjs+l2];
01258     *reverse_latency = latency_matrix[l2*nbobjs+l1];
01259     return 0;
01260   }
01261 
01262   errno = ENOSYS;
01263   return -1;
01264 }
01265 
01280 static inline hwloc_obj_t
01281 hwloc_get_non_io_ancestor_obj(hwloc_topology_t topology ,
01282                               hwloc_obj_t ioobj)
01283 {
01284   hwloc_obj_t obj = ioobj;
01285   while (obj && !obj->cpuset) {
01286     obj = obj->parent;
01287   }
01288   return obj;
01289 }

01295 static inline hwloc_obj_t
01296 hwloc_get_next_pcidev(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t prev)
01297 {
01298   return hwloc_get_next_obj_by_type(topology, HWLOC_OBJ_PCI_DEVICE, prev);
01299 }
01300 
01304 static inline hwloc_obj_t
01305 hwloc_get_pcidev_by_busid(hwloc_topology_t topology,
01306                           unsigned domain, unsigned bus, unsigned dev, unsigned func)
01307 {
01308   hwloc_obj_t obj = NULL;
01309   while ((obj = hwloc_get_next_pcidev(topology, obj)) != NULL) {
01310     if (obj->attr->pcidev.domain == domain
01311         && obj->attr->pcidev.bus == bus
01312         && obj->attr->pcidev.dev == dev
01313         && obj->attr->pcidev.func == func)
01314       return obj;
01315   }
01316   return NULL;
01317 }
01318 
01322 static inline hwloc_obj_t
01323 hwloc_get_pcidev_by_busidstring(hwloc_topology_t topology, const char *busid)
01324 {
01325   unsigned domain = 0; /* default */
01326   unsigned bus, dev, func;
01327 
01328   if (sscanf(busid, "%x:%x.%x", &bus, &dev, &func) != 3
01329       && sscanf(busid, "%x:%x:%x.%x", &domain, &bus, &dev, &func) != 4) {
01330     errno = EINVAL;
01331     return NULL;
01332   }
01333 
01334   return hwloc_get_pcidev_by_busid(topology, domain, bus, dev, func);
01335 }

01337 /* FIXME move GL/display helpers to hwloc/gl.h */
01341 static inline hwloc_obj_t
01342 hwloc_get_pcidev_by_display(hwloc_topology_t topology, const int port, const int device)
01343 {
01344   hwloc_obj_t pcidev_obj;
01345 
01346   /* Forming the display string */
01347   char x_display [10];
01348   snprintf(x_display,sizeof(x_display),":%d.%d", port, device);
01349 
01350   pcidev_obj = hwloc_gl_query_display(topology, x_display);
01351 
01352   if (pcidev_obj != NULL)
01353     return pcidev_obj;
01354   else
01355     return NULL;
01356 }

01372 static inline hwloc_obj_t
01373 hwloc_get_next_bridge(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t prev)

01377 
01378 /* \brief Checks whether a given bridge covers a given PCI bus.
01379  */
01380 static inline int
01381 hwloc_bridge_covers_pcibus(hwloc_obj_t bridge,
01382                            unsigned domain, unsigned bus)
01383 {
01384   return bridge->type == HWLOC_OBJ_BRIDGE
01385     && bridge->attr->bridge.downstream_type == HWLOC_OBJ_BRIDGE_PCI
01386     && bridge->attr->bridge.downstream.pci.domain == domain
01387     && bridge->attr->bridge.downstream.pci.secondary_bus <= bus
01388     && bridge->attr->bridge.downstream.pci.subordinate_bus >= bus;
01389 }
01390 
01396 static inline hwloc_obj_t
01397 hwloc_get_hostbridge_by_pcibus(hwloc_topology_t topology,
01398                                unsigned domain, unsigned bus)
01399 {
01400   hwloc_obj_t obj = NULL;
01401   while ((obj = hwloc_get_next_bridge(topology, obj)) != NULL) {
01402     if (hwloc_bridge_covers_pcibus(obj, domain, bus)) {
01403       /* found bridge covering this pcibus, make sure it's a hostbridge */
01404       assert(obj->attr->bridge.upstream_type == HWLOC_OBJ_BRIDGE_HOST);
01405       assert(obj->parent->type != HWLOC_OBJ_BRIDGE);
01406       assert(obj->parent->cpuset);
01407       return obj;
01408     }
01409   }
01410   return NULL;
01411 }
